data.title: Rani Mukerji: Articles, Photos, Videos & More Info
data.meta_description: Check out new articles, photos, videos, biography, stats, history, movies, wallpapers and more info on Rani Mukerji on MensXP.com.
data.text:
Almost every field has people who take guidance from the books of numerology to achieve success, but it’s the actors who often come to light for altering the spelling of their names. Does it work or does it not? These actors are the real proofs.

As Hum Tum completes 20 years, director Kunal Kohli reveals why Aamir Khan, Hrithik Roshan and Vivek Oberoi rejected the cult rom-com that eventually starred Saif Ali Khan and it won him his first National Film Award.

After over three decades in Bollywood, Kajol has turned into a mass action star with her upcoming masala entertainer Maharagni that reunites her with Prabhu Deva after 27 years. Watch the first glimpse.

In a 2012 interview, Uday Chopra revealed his plan of remaking Bunty Aur Babli in Hollywood and expressed his desire to cast Taylor Swift and Michael Cera in the lead roles originally played by Rani Mukerji and Abhishek Bachchan.

Sanjay Leela Bhansali is being compared to Karan Johar after a video began trending online, where he moved Richa Chadha to highlight his niece Sharmin Segal at the Heeramandi premiere.

In an interview with Lilly Singh, director Sanjay Leela Bhansali recently revealed that the original choice for his series ‘Heermandi’ was Fawad Khan, Mahira Khan and Imran Abbas.

26 years before Bade Miyan Chote Miyan and Maidaan clash, the OG BMCM starring Amitabh Bachchan and Govinda took on Shah Rukh Khan’s Kuch Kuch Hota Hai.

Film buffs on X shared some of the best easter eggs and meta humour moments from iconic Bollywood films that many may have missed. Here are 21 of them.

Tabu is riding high on the success of her latest film Crew which has made over Rs 70 crore in just four days at the worldwide box office. As Crew heads towards Rs 100 crore biz, here’s a look at 6 huge hits rejected by Tabu, from Badhaai Ho to Kuch Kuch Hota Hai.

Crew is on an unstoppable rampage at the box office and has become the fourth highest-grossing female-centric film post-pandemic beating Mrs. Chaterjee vs Norway. Here is the list of all female-led hits post-pandemic.

In an interview, Bade Miyan Chote Miyan producer Vashu Bhagnani reacted to Govinda overshadowing Amitabh Bachchan in the 1998 hit and revealed that Big B had stated, “Yaar maidaan agar khol do hum dono dekhte hain kya hoga.”

A new report claimed that a sequel to Anil Kapoor’s cult 2001 film Nayak: The Real Hero titled Nayak 2 is in works and will be helmed by Milan Luthria and backed by Siddharth Anand. However, producer Deepak Mukut has termed it fake news stating that he owns the rights to the franchise.

Adipurush director Om Raut to be one of the panellists in the FICCI Frames for unveiling the next ‘Oppenheimer in Cinema’ session and fans are angry.

Here's a look at 4 popular actress duos that formed most successful on-screen pairing in history of Bollywood and delivered multiple hits. These are Rani Mukerji-Preity Zinta, Karisma Kapoor-Tabu, Smita Patil-Shabana Azmi and Sridevi-Jaya Prada.

Saif Ali Khan has reunited with Siddharth Anand after 17 years of Ta Ra Rum Pum for an action-thriller titled Jewel Thief starring Saif and Jaideep Ahlawat in the lead roles. Read details.

The Bollywood industry, as many people say, is very closely knit. However, a lot of people did not know that it was quite literally closely knit and related. Here is a look at some celebrities that no one knew were related.

From Rani Mukerji-Preity Zinta, Karisma Kapoor-Tabu, Smita Patil-Shabana Azmi to Sridevi-Jaya Prada, here's a look at 4 popular actress duos that formed most successful on-screen pairing in Bollywood and delivered multiple hits.

19 years after its theatrical release, Sanjay Leela Bhansali's Black starring Amitabh Bachchan and Rani Mukerji released online on Netflix on February 4, 2024. Here are 7 films of 2023 that have not yet made it online: Zara Hatke Zara Bachke, The Kerala Story, Ganapath, Yaariyan 2, The Ladykiller, Gandhi Godse – Ek Yudh and Jogira Sara Ra Ra.

After winning the Best Actress award for her performance in Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani, Alia Bhatt has joined the likes of Nutan and Kajol to win the most number of Filmfare Best Actress awards beating Madhuri Dixit and Meena Kumari. Alia has been awarded the trophy 5 times.

In an interview, Karan Johar admitted that he sends people to fake praise his average films as part of the audience and creates a perception that his flop film has become a big box office success.

Karan Johar and Sandeep Reddy Vanga recently appeared in a round table interview. Karan Johar called Animal ‘the best film of the year’ and said that he had tears in his eyes while watching the film.

This time 'Anjali' and 'Tina' of the film "Kuch Kuch Hota Hai" graced the couch of the hit chat show, Koffee with Karan. Their appearance on the show stirred up the expected drama leading them to delve into their past coldness. While Karan Johar too engaged in some fun banter with this cousin duo, bringing back too many memories together.

From Shah Rukh Khan's Fan, Rajesh Khanna's Ittefaq, Urmila Matondkar & Manonj Bajpayee's Kaun, Rajendra Kumar's Kanoon, Ajay Devgn's Bhoot, Naseeruddin Shah's Jaane Bhi Do Yaaron, Rani Mukerji & Amitabh Bachchan's Black to Naseeruddin Shah & Anupam Kher's A Wednesday, check out 8 best songless Bollywood films of all time.

Kajol and Rani Mukerji recently appeared on Koffee With Karan and made some shocking revelations about their careers and films. Here are 4 cult hits rejected by Kajol and Rani Mukerji.

Suhana Khan recently made some comments on sustainable clothing for which she is getting brutally trolled and people are calling her ‘Ananya 2.0’.

Shah Rukh Khan has a cameo in Salman Khan’s Tiger 3. Take a look at two other times SRK appeared in Bhai’s films — Har Dil Jo Pyar Karega and Tubelight.

Siddhant Chaturvedi seems to have disappeared after his last film, Phone Bhoot. Fans discuss his disappearance and upcoming projects on social media.

Rani Mukerji shared an update on Mardaani 3 in a recent interview and talked about the only reason she won't do a sequel.

Rani Mukerji recently shared an update on Mardaani 3, revealing the only reason why she won’t go back to playing the hardened cop in a sequel.

Aamir Khan’s take on gender pay disparity in an olde interview has resurfaced on social media, sparking a debate amongst netizens.

Gadar 2 has been released and is destroying each and every possible box office record. Here are 8 Bollywood films based on the India-Pakistan relationship like Gadar 2.

Rani Mukerji revealed how she lost her second baby due to miscarriage & the way it inspired her performance in Mrs Chatterjee Vs Norway.

Karan Johar films are often accused of being regressive and interestingly, his latest release Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani has turned out to be completely opposite of what his detractors accuse him of. But, one look at his filmography and you realise that even his so-called “regressive” films have been influential in Bollywood’s progression.

Before Dharmendra-Shabana Azmi's much-talked about kiss In Karan Johar's Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani, here's a look at older stars like Amitabh Bachchan, Naseeruddin Shah, Deepti Naval, Nafisa Ali, Rajesh Khanna and their on-screen kiss post 60 years of age.

The highly anticipated trailer of Karan Johar’s Rocky Aur Rani Kii Prem Kahaani has garnered an immense response from all over. Besides the lead star cast of Dharmendra, Jaya Bachchan, Shabana Azmi, Ranveer Singh and Alia Bhatt, a few eagle-eyed fans have spotted Ananya Panday’s cameo in the trailer.

Vicky Kaushal's Zara Hatke Zara Bachke has surprised the trade & fans with a good start at the box office despite low buzz. The opening day collection of the film is 7th biggest of 2023 beating Akshay Kumar & Emraan Hashmi starrer Selfiee, Aditya Roy Kapur's Gumraah, Aishwarya Rai Bachchan's Ponniyin Selvan 2, Rani Mukerji's Mrs Chatterjee Vs Norway & Arjun Kapoor's Kuttey.

Here are 5 iconic on-screen bollywood couples who hated each other in real life like Shahid & Kareena Kapoor and Rani Mukerji & Saif Ali Khan.

This article talks about new OTT releases in this week of May releasing on Netflix, prime video and Disney+hotstar. The list includes titles like Vikram Vedha and Air.

Salman Khan playing the brother-in-law of his ex on-screen lover, Bhumika Chawla in ‘Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan’ shows Bollywood’s age gap problem.

In an interview, Kajol was asked about the choices her character Anjali makes in Kuch Kuch Hota Hai. Kajol stated that if she was Anjali she’d have definitely gone with Salman Khan’s Aman instead of Shah Rukh Khan’s Rahul. She also said she wouldn’t have worn traditional clothes and would’ve stuck to joggers and sneakers.

From Akshay Kumar and Saif Ali Khan's Main Khiladi Tu Anari, Suniel Shetty's Gopi Kishan, Salman Khan's Jaanam Samjha Karo, Govinda's Hadh Kar Di Aapne to Ajay Devgn's Vijaypath, here are 5 cult Bollywood films that are helmed by unknown directors.

On Ram Charan’s 38th birthday, the makers of his next film RC 15 have dropped a title announcement video revealing the name of the film to be Game Changer. Co-starring Kiara Advani and SJ Surya, Game Changer is directed by S Shankar. As soon as the title announcement video was released, a number of fans took to social media and started decoding the meaning behind it.

Rani Mukerji's Mrs Chatterjee Vs Norway has shown strong legs at the box office despite other films of such genres failing to find an audience in theaters post-pandemic. Rani has beaten Kajol, Kangana Ranaut, Taapsee Pannu, Parineeti Chopra, Janhvi Kapoor & Kiara Advani among others as biggest Bollywood star.

After the narrative that was going around that South cinema has taken over Bollywood, Rani Mukerji has proved it to be absolutely false as she has taken over the box office beating three major South superstars - Upendra, Kichcha Sudeepa and Shivrajkumar. Her film Mrs Chatterjee vs Norway has thrashed the pan-India film Kabzaa in Hindi.

Rani Mukerji is one of the finest actresses of the Hindi film industry. Her recent film Mrs Chatterjee Vs Norway has been breaking records at the box office. Here is a look at Rani Mukerji’s impressive educational qualifications.

Rani Mukerji has returned to the big screen with her new film Mrs Chatterjee vs Norway. Despite the low buzz and the genre that it belongs to, MCVN has taken a pretty good opening at the box office in India. But in Norway, the film has shattered all-time records beating the likes of Shah Rukh Khan’s Pathaan and Raees and Salman Khan’s Sultan, Bajrangi Bhaijaan and Race 3.

With the initial success of Mrs Chatterjee Vs Norway, Rani Mukerji has again proved that she is the real queen of solo hits and is far better than her contemporaries Kareena Kapoor, Kajol and the actresses of the 90’s

Rani Mukerji's latest release Mrs Chatterjee vs Norway has created history in Norway. The small budget film has taken down five of the biggest films of Indian cinema - Pathaan, Sultan, Bajrangi Bhaijaan, Raees & Race 3. Rani Mukerji has proved herself to be the biggest box office queen beating superstars Shah Rukh Khan & Salman Khan.

Sushant Singh Rajput’s Detective Byomkesh Bakshy, Abhay Deol’s Manorama Six Feet Under, Vidya Balan’s Kahani, Madhuri Dixit’s 100 Days, Mithun Chakraborty’s Teesra Kaun, Akshay Kumar’s Khiladi, Bobby Deol and Kajol’s Gupt, Rajesh Khanna’s Ittefaq - here are 15 best Bollywood whodunits & murder mysteries to watch.

Ranbir Kapoor’s Tu Jhoothi Main Makkaar is still going strong at the box office as the film has crushed Kapil Sharma’s Zwigato, pan-Indian film Kabzaa and Rani Mukerji’s Mrs Chatterjee vs Norway.

Rani Mukerji’s latest release Mrs Chatterjee vs Norway has done pretty well at the box office in its opening weekend despite being a limited release in just 535 screens in India. The real-life based drama is now on course to be her fourth solo hit after Mardaani, Hichki and Mardaani 2.

A new picture of Salman Khan from the screening of Mrs Chatterjee Vs Norway is going viral on social media. In the picture, Salman is seen hugging Rani Mukerji and it’s his new look or rather an old look that has caught everyone’s attention. The look is reminding fans of Kick and most are now convinced his next after Tiger 3 is Kick 2.

Not every sequel gains mass popularity and love. Some tend to impact the original icon, making the franchise dead. Here are a few examples of such sequels.

While social media has become a window into the worlds of our favourite Bollywood celebrities as well as a viable platform for them to interact with their fans and receive their love, there are a few celebrities who have opted out of using it. Let's see who are these and why social media failed to appeal to them.

Shah Rukh Khan has undeniable acting talent, but what separates a great actor from a good one is how organic and believable their performances are. Khan does this with grace and ease, consistently displaying a wide range of authentic emotions on the big screen. Here are three examples of his portrayals of toxic husbands, which audiences both love to hate and applaud.

After Tabu nailed the character of Manjulika in Bhool Bhulaiyaa 2 & turned out to be the MVP of the film, here are 5 other actress who play the antagonist to perfection in the recently announced Bhool Bhulaiyaa 3 starring Kartik Aaryan & helmed by Anees Bazmee.

Bollywood has a lot of money to go around. These 10 Bolly power couples have a net worth that makes them richer than royalty!

Here are four movies of Rani Mukerji in which the characters she played on screen were heavily inspired by real people.

With the recent buzz and excitement on social media about Salman Khan's widely hailed cameo in Shah Rukh Khan starrer Pathaan and Allu Arjun's rumored special appearance in SRK’s other action-packed Jawan, it's time to appreciate the King of Bollywood's own cameos and imagine what a parallel universe would look like if these cameos each had their own spin-off. Here are the top six SRK cameos we adore and would be thrilled to see if the characters ever get their own full-length films.
